input.sentences: [female] 's wedding was at an old castle .
they lit unity candles during the ceremony .
at the reception they had veal and mashed potatoes .
they danced the night away after dinner .
the final thing they did was cut the cake and share pictures .
output.sentences: This female got to have her wedding in a castle.
The ceremony featured lit candle tapers that the couple touched together to symbolize their unity.
The elegant, sit-down reception featured veal and potatoes, expertly cooked.
We danced the night away after the heavy dinner, which was probably a good thing.
The final minutes of the night drew near, but we lingered, snapping pictures we could share later.
